content:
Tabula Rasa (nasdaq TRHC) has many openings right now spanning from QA to Analytics to Software Development. We're a high growth company doing amazing things to prevent Adverse Drug Events. ~300% stock growth in the last 12 months, and consistently large annual sales growth rate. We're currently ramping up our team to support FHIR and SMART applications and are adding people at all levels of experience.

Most positions are located in either Charleston, SC or Moorestown, NJ, but excellent candidates will be considered regardless of location.
All positions can be viewed here: http://tabularasahealthcareinc.appone.com/

Or just reach out to me directly with your resume.
